root.title: 16 Chirik-Tash
root.place: Location is in 1.5 km south west of hole Nizhnee Soru (Lower Soru), in 5 km from village Kulada of Ongudai regin.
root.general: Single runic signs on rock Chirik-Tash. Located on south slope of the mountain at foot, on screen faced to east, along with two inscriptions in old Mongol alphabet.
root.investigation: Jamaeva found in 1995. Publication: Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
